definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lit. gold and jade fill the hall (idiom)/fig. abundant wealth/abundance of knowledge
gilded exterior, shabby and ruined on the inside (idiom)
pinyin: jin1 yu4 qi2 wai4 , bai4 xu4 qi2 zhong1

definition: gilded exterior, shabby and ruined on the inside (idiom)
pinyin: jin1 yu4 qi2 biao3 , bai4 xu4 qi2 zhong1

sentences.english: A house full of jade and gold is hard to protect.
sentences.chinese: 满堂金玉，没有人能长久保守。

sentences.english: The future of cinema just became a gaudy, gift-wrapped present.
sentences.chinese: 电影的未来正在成为一个金玉其外的大礼包。

sentences.english: Amidst great pomp and ceremony, it handed out some 302 gold and jade medals.
sentences.chinese: 在这场盛宴里，颁发了302枚金玉奖牌。

sentences.english: Listen to me. I'm giving you pearls here.
sentences.chinese: 听我说，这是我给你的金玉良言。

sentences.english: The old often give good advice to the young.
sentences.chinese: 老年人常常对年轻人提出金玉良言。

sentences.english: This is the famous Golden Jade Guanyin.
sentences.chinese: 这就是有名的金玉观世音。

sentences.english: I am deeply grateful to you for your advice.
sentences.chinese: 我非常感谢你给我的金玉良言。

sentences.english: Thee Chinese people refer to a good relationship as "a bond of gold and jade."
sentences.chinese: 中国人将美好的姻缘称为“金玉良缘”。

sentences.english: You regard the beneficial words as a puff of wind, and will regret it sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 你把金玉良言当作耳旁风，总有一天会后悔的。

sentences.english: Sometimes really can't live too numb, need some good advice to brainwashed.
sentences.chinese: 有时真的不能活得太麻木，需要一些金玉良言来洗脑。

sentences.english: Perhaps, some things are doomed to have it, take Golden fate God bestows. speaking.
sentences.chinese: 或许，有的事情是已经注定的吧，就拿金玉良缘来说。

sentences.english: You're the words in my books.
sentences.chinese: 你是我书里的金玉良言。

sentences.english: Assist the vice mayor Wang Jinyu in economic works.
sentences.chinese: 协助王金玉副市长分管经济工作。

sentences.english: Sage advice, I thought, as I was working on an important project.
sentences.chinese: 我在忙着一重要项目时，心想，这真是金玉良言啊。

sentences.english: His words are closely followed by the investment community.
sentences.chinese: 他的话被投资界奉为金玉良言。
